name: iswith
description: Discover what inputs are being used in your Github workflows

scripts.build:all: npm run build:linux && npm run build:macos && npm run build:windows
scripts.build:pkg: rm -rf dist/* && mkdir -p dist/linux dist/macos dist/windows && pkg . --targets node18-linux-x64 --output dist/linux/iswith && pkg . --targets node18-macos-x64 --output dist/macos/iswith && pkg . --targets node18-win-x64 --output dist/windows/iswith.exe
